tool.name: ReduceRemoveHydrogens
tool.description: : This class is a wrapper of the Ambertools reduce module for removing hydrogens from a given structure.

param.label: input PDB file
param.help: Path to the input file. Format: [input].pdb

param.help: File containing tool settings. See below for the syntax

param.name: binary_path
param.label: binary_path
param.help: Path to the reduce executable binary.
